topic.title: Finding the owner of a shared dictionary

keywords.indexterm: viewing the list window details ofshared Translation Memory databases
displaying the list window details ofshared Translation Memory databases
viewing the list window details ofshared dictionaries
displaying the list window details ofshared dictionaries
owner of a shared resource, viewing

body.p: In the Dictionary List window, you can display additional information about a shared dictionary. The Owner column shows the user ID of the person who created the shared resource.
